DOC.brief_summary: The Purpose randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , single-dose , dose-escalation clinical trial explore investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , food effect PMK-S005 oral administration healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics , Food Effect PMK-S005 After Oral Administration Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male 20 year ≤ age ≤ 40 year . Weight ≥ 55kg , IBW ±20 % . Patients normal hematology , biochemistry , urinary result . Patients congenital chronic disease . Provision write informed consent voluntarily . Patients know hypersensitivity component study drug . Patients history abnormal digestive organ , kidney , respiratory , neuroendocrine , cardiovascular , hematooncology , urinary , muscloskeletal , immune , nose ear , psychiatry , stomach system . Patients gastrointestinal disorder . Systolic blood pressure ≥ 150 ≤ 90 mmHg , Diasolic blood pressure ≥ 95 ≤ 50 mmHg . Drug abuser , alcoholic . Patients take ETC medication within 14 day , OTC within 7 day . Patients take investigational product within 60 day prior participation study .
